verbose_text: Interestingly, a modulation in P2RY12 / P2ry12 expression has been reported in the brain of Alzheimer 's disease animal models XREF_BIBR and multiple sclerosis animal models as well as patients XREF_BIBR, and a reduction in its expression levels has recently been linked to a particular microglial phenotype, specifically associated with neurodegenerative diseases XREF_BIBR : this body of evidence supports the relevance of a P2RY12 tracer for the study of neurodegenerative diseases.
